wikipedia_page.main: John Rowland (1936–2002) was a Welsh professional footballer. Rowland joined Newport County in 1958 from local club Lovells Athletic. He went on to make 463 appearances for Newport scoring 9 goals. In 1969, he joined Merthyr Tydfil as player/manager.

response: * John Rowland (Desperate Housewives), character in the U.S. television series Desperate Housewives
* John Rowland: the main protagonist in the 1898 novella The Wreck of the Titan: Or, Futility by Morgan Robertson
